name: scripts/Classes/Box.js
calculateWidth
description:
Called by the parent `Row` using the number of boxes
to calculate and set the CSS width property

params.name: numberOfBoxes
params.description: The number of boxes in the row

params.name: labelWidth
params.description: The row name with, to subtract from the calculation

name: getTransportPosition
description: Used to calculate the position for Tone.Transport

params.name: positionNumber
params.description: This box's place in the row

name: isFilled
description:
Determine whether the current box has an event associated with it
and sets the appropriate css class

name: flash
description:
`Box.flash()` is called by a `Row` object to animate 
a block as part of the `Tone.Sequencer` callback

name: scripts/Classes/DrumLoop.js
setUpLoop
description:
Create loops, overwrites `Loop.setUpLoop()` to convert
an array of numbers into notes, as used by the drum sampler

name: convertPatternToNotes
description:
Used by the overwritten setUpLoop() to convert an array
of numbers into note names

params.name: part
params.description: Part object that includes an array of numbers in `part.pattern`

return.description: Part object with the pattern converted into notes

scripts/Classes/Loop.js
constructor
description: Synthesizer loop structure and graphical representation

content:
# Loop Builder

![Documentation coverage](./docs/badge.svg)

This is a test project that links [tone.js](https://tonejs.github.io) to a graphical interface to create looping melodies and rhythms. Documentation is in [the docs folder](./docs/index.html).

## Features

* Manipulate the timbre of generated synthesizer melodies using a graphical effects controller

### Next

* Add control to change melody and bass loops
* Add control to change drum loop
* Write a short introduction
* Allow saving and loading

## Sounds

* Cowbell sound is from [GowlerMusic on freesound.org](https://freesound.org/people/GowlerMusic/sounds/364919/)
